text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Heres a idea....Protect seniors by doing everything in your power to stop the spread of the deadly covid-19 instead of encouraging everyone to go out maskless to rally's, protests and parties and end up taking this virus back to our vulnerable seniors.
